title: Fake AAP Candidate List for Delhi Polls Shared With Communal Angle
subtitle: Aam Aadmi Party’s List For Delhi Assembly Elections 2020 Fact Check: A fake message is being circulated to claim that the Aam Aadmi Party has decided to field 21 Muslims out of 27 candidates in its first list for upcoming Delhi polls.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The Quint could verify that the message in circulation is fake as no such list has been released by the Aam Aadmi Party.

Further, AAP released its list of candidates on 14 January and most of the names in the actual list don’t match with the list which is going viral.

For instance: AAP has fielded Rajendra Pal Gautam from Seemapuri but the viral list claimed that the candidate is Badruddin Khan. Similarly, the party has fielded Virender Singh Kadian from Delhi Cantonment but the list named Nushrat Khan.

You can see the complete (verified) list of candidates here.
